Yitro.descr: full parashah with Ten Commandments every year

alt.descr: triennial divisions with Ten Commandments in years two and three

Vaetchanan.descr: with the Ten Commandments every year and the Sh'ma in years two and three

alt.descr: with the Ten Commandments in year two and the Sh'ma in year three

Nitzavim.descr: When these Sidrot are not combined, they should each be read in their entirety.

Vayeilech.descr: When these Sidrot are not combined, they should each be read in their entirety.

Vezot Haberakhah.descr: האזינו-וזאת הברכה should both be read in their entirety due to their brief length
